options.name: Mystic
options.description: Learn 2 Druidic and 2 Divine Beginner Spells

options.name: Spirit Companion
options.description: You convert a Beast tamed by you to a Spirit Companion during a 12 Hour Ritual removing any need to Eat, Breath or Sleep. When this Spirit Companion reaches 0 Health, it vanishes into the Ethereal Realm and must be summoned again using this same Ritual.

options.name: Elementalist
options.description: Gain +1 Elemental Mitigation and Learn 2 Novice Druidic Spells

options.name: Careful Healing
options.description: When you can administer one Potion or Spell that restores Health to an Ally while taking a Breather, increasing the effectiveness by adding one Dice to the total amount Healed.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Trance
options.description: Once per day, you take a Breather where you place yourself into a Trance. While in this Trance you are considered Unconscious for the duration and regain Health and Power equal to your Level when it completes.

options.name: Action : Dream Totem
options.description: You place down a totem on the ground which grants all Allies within 8 Units +1 Resistance and Psychic Mitigation equal to your Level while they are within the Area. Additionally, while an Ally is within the protection of the Totem, they cannot be put to sleep by magic or suffer the effects of Spells that cause nightmares or dreams.
